author: parsonsd
msg: Fix to Sandesha as problem highlighted after move to recent Axis2 release.  The thread ABORT logic has changed slightly in Axis2 so was causing NPE's when an RM inorder response was being delivered to a client.  The fix is to use a thread SUSPEND for inorder Sync responses.

author: barrettj
msg: Fix bug in OperationContext.removeMessageContexts(String) that was causing it to never remove anything.  Added TDD unit test for same.

author: tabish
msg: Add some tests for the XmlPrimitiveMapMarshaler and a couple fixes to the marshaler.  Can now read marshaled XML maps
